info.name: finan_15_verify_report_account_receivable
info.description:
### Testsuite: Verify report acccount receivable

Testcase:

1. Login with owner account
2. Get data
    
    1. contact / Get list contact => get all contact
        
    2. invoice / Get list invoice => mapping invoice into contact list at 2.a
        
    3. transaction / Get list transaction => mapping transaction into contact list at 2.a
        
    4. posting / Get list posting => update contact_list
        
3. Check data
    
    1. report / get account receivable customer => compare data
        
    2. report / get account receivable invoice => compare data
        

###### Note:

exec: * currently, manual to create account pwd & use charles to get it
* default pwd created: 21112007 (prod with default account & no need pwd)
